title: Can I do a B.Ed as an external student? - Quora

response.answer_text: Unable to understand what do you mean as an “external student”? Generally, the Bachelor of Education | B.Ed course can be pursued by correspondence and by regular mode. There are a number of universities available who offers the course in different-different states. One of the most known is B.Ed from MDU | Maharishi Dayanand University Rohtak, and Kurukshetra University based in Kurukshetra Haryana. Both of the universities are A+ ranked universities by NAAC.
